author: John Timmer
title: First look at the outcomes of COVID-19 patients in NY hospitals
description: The data provide a snapshot of the early stages of the pandemic in the US' epicenter.
content:
2 with 2 posters participating
On March 1, New York City confirmed its first case of SARS-CoV-2 infection. By the end of the month, thousands were infected, and hospitals were struggling to manage the influx of patients. On Wednesday, JAMA published an analy… [+5955 chars]
